name: King of Seas [DEMO]
description:
This is a demo of a school project made during my second year at a Game Design school in 2019.
You can see a breakdown of the project here: http://alexandre-brodu.com/my-games/king-of-seas

/!\ THIS IS NOT A FINISHED GAME

You play a pirate captain who wants to become the most powerful in all the seas

Controls

/!\ YOU NEED AN XBOX CONTROLLER IN ORDER TO PLAY

Right stick: move character
Left stick: move camera
A: interact
Left & Right Triggers: use cannons
B & X: Control sails

/!\ ONLY FRENCH IS AVAILABLE
